trans-unit.source: A data bound list control that displays the items from data source in a table.
trans-unit.target: En bundet kontroll som viser elementer fra datakilden i en tabell.

trans-unit.source: The DataGrid control allows you to select, sort, and edit these items.
trans-unit.target: DataGrid-kontrollen kan du velge, sortere og redigere disse elementene.

trans-unit.source: In this topic: - [Introduction](#Introduction) - [Accessibility](#Accessibility) - [Declarative Syntax](#DeclarativeSyntax) > [!NOTE] > Before you use the DataGrid control, consider using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control instead.
trans-unit.target: I dette emnet:- [Introduksjon](#Introduction) - [tilgjengelighet](#Accessibility) - [deklarerende syntaksen](#DeclarativeSyntax) > [!NOTE] > før du bruker DataGrid-kontrollen, kan du vurdere å bruke den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>kontrollerer i stedet.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control, which was introduced in the .NET Framework version 2.0, is the successor to the DataGrid control.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>kontrollen som er introdusert i .NET Framework, versjon 2.0, er etterfølgende DataGrid styre.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: ## Introduction Use the DataGrid control to display the fields of a data source as columns in a table.
trans-unit.target: ## Introduksjon Bruk DataGrid-kontrollen skal vises feltene for en datakilde som kolonner i en tabell.

trans-unit.source: Each row in the DataGrid control represents a record in the data source.
trans-unit.target: Hver rad i DataGrid-kontrollen representerer en oppføring i datakilden.

trans-unit.source: The DataGrid control supports selection, editing, deleting, paging, and sorting.
trans-unit.target: DataGrid-kontrollen støtter utvalget, redigere, slette, bla og sortering.

trans-unit.source: > [!CAUTION] > This control can be used to display user input, which might include malicious client script.
trans-unit.target: > [!CAUTION] > Kontrollen kan brukes til å vise brukerinndata, som kan inneholde skadelig klientskript.

trans-unit.source: Check any information that is sent from a client for executable script, SQL statements, or other code before displaying it in your application.
trans-unit.target: Kontroller informasjonen som ble sendt fra en klient for kjørbare skript, SQL-setninger eller annen kode før det blir vist i programmet.

trans-unit.source: ASP.NET provides an input request validation feature to block script and HTML in user input.
trans-unit.target: ASP.NET gir et inndataforespørselen valideringsfunksjonen til å blokkere skript og HTML i brukerinndata.

trans-unit.source: Validation server controls are also provided to assess user input.
trans-unit.target: Validering serverkontroller leveres også for å vurdere brukerinndata.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Validation Server Control Syntax](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/96d2c59e-693c-4079-9b53-b3ff0d9e9133).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se [validering Server kontrollen syntaks](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/96d2c59e-693c-4079-9b53-b3ff0d9e9133).

trans-unit.source: Different column types determine the behavior of the columns in the control.
trans-unit.target: Annen kolonnetyper fastsetter virkemåten til kolonnene i kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the different column types that can be used.
trans-unit.target: Tabellen nedenfor viser annen kolonnetypene som kan brukes.

trans-unit.source: |Column Type|Description| |-----------------|-----------------| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundColumn>|Displays a column bound to a field in a data source.
trans-unit.target: | Kolonnetypen | Beskrivelse | |-----------------|-----------------| | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundColumn>| Viser en kolonne som er bundet til et felt i en datakilde.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundColumn>

trans-unit.source: It displays each item in the field as text.
trans-unit.target: Den viser hvert element i feltet som tekst.

trans-unit.source: This is the default column type of the DataGrid control.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonColumn>|Displays a command button for each item in the column.
trans-unit.target: Dette er standard kolonnetypen kontrollens DataGrid. | | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonColumn>| Viser en kommandoknapp for hvert element i kolonnen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonColumn>

trans-unit.source: This allows you to create a column of custom button controls, such as `Add` or `Remove` buttons.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EditCommandColumn>|Displays a column that contains editing commands for each item in the column.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLinkColumn>|Displays the contents of each item in the column as a hyperlink.
trans-unit.target: Dette gjør at du kan opprette en kolonne med egendefinerte kontrollene, for eksempel `Add` eller `Remove` knapper. | | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EditCommandColumn>| Viser en kolonne som inneholder redigering kommandoer for hvert element i kolonnen. | | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLinkColumn>| Viser innholdet i hvert element i kolonnen som hyperkobling.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLinkColumn> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EditCommandColumn>

trans-unit.source: The contents of the column can be bound to a field in a data source or static text.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplateColumn>|Displays each item in the column following a specified template.
trans-unit.target: Innholdet i kolonnen kan bindes til et felt i en datakilde eller statisk tekst. | | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplateColumn>| Viser hvert element i kolonnen som samsvarer med en angitt mal.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplateColumn>

trans-unit.source: This allows you to provide custom controls in the column.| By default, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.AutoGenerateColumns%2A> property is set to `true`, which creates a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundColumn> object for each field in the data source.
trans-unit.target: Dette lar deg angi egendefinerte kontroller i kolonnen. | Som standard i <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.AutoGenerateColumns%2A>er satt til `true`, som oppretter en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundColumn>objekt for hvert felt i datakilden.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundColumn> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.AutoGenerateColumns%2A>

trans-unit.source: Each field is then rendered as a column in the DataGrid control in the order that each field appears in the data source.
trans-unit.target: Hvert felt gjengis deretter som en kolonne i DataGrid-kontrollen i rekkefølgen som vises hvert felt i datakilden.

trans-unit.source: You can also manually control which columns appear in the DataGrid control by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.AutoGenerateColumns%2A> property to `false` and then listing the columns that you want to include between the opening and closing `<Columns>` tags.
trans-unit.target: Du kan også manuelt kontrollere hvilke kolonner vises i DataGrid-kontrollen ved å angi den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.AutoGenerateColumns%2A>egenskapen `false` og angir kolonnene som du vil inkludere mellom innledende og avsluttende `<Columns>` koder.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.AutoGenerateColumns%2A>

trans-unit.source: The columns specified are added to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.Columns%2A> collection in the order listed.
trans-unit.target: Kolonnene som er angitt, er lagt til i <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.Columns%2A>samling i rekkefølgen som vises.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.Columns%2A>

trans-unit.source: This allows you to programmatically control the columns in the DataGrid control.
trans-unit.target: Dette lar deg kontrollere programmatisk kolonnene i DataGrid-kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The order that the columns are displayed in the DataGrid control is controlled by the order that the columns appear in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.Columns%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Rekkefølgen som vises kolonnene i DataGrid-kontrollen styres av rekkefølgen for kolonnene i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.Columns%2A>samlingen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.Columns%2A>

trans-unit.source: Although you can programmatically change the order of the columns by manipulating the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.Columns%2A> collection, it is easier to list the columns in the desired display order.
trans-unit.target: Selv om du kan endre rekkefølgen på kolonnene programmatisk ved manipulering av <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.Columns%2A>samling, er det enklere å vise kolonnene i ønsket visningsrekkefølgen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.Columns%2A>

trans-unit.source: Explicitly declared columns can be displayed in conjunction with automatically generated columns.
trans-unit.target: Eksplisitt deklarerte kolonner kan vises i forbindelse med kolonner som er automatisk generert.

trans-unit.source: When using both, explicitly declared columns will be rendered first, followed by the automatically generated columns.
trans-unit.target: Når du bruker både eksplisitt deklarert kolonner blir gjengitt først, etterfulgt av de automatisk genererte kolonnene.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Automatically generated columns are not added to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.Columns%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Automatisk genererte kolonner er ikke lagt til i <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.Columns%2A>samlingen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.Columns%2A>

trans-unit.source: The appearance of the DataGrid control may be customized by setting the style properties for the different parts of the control.
trans-unit.target: Utseendet til DataGrid-kontrollen kan tilpasses ved å angi stilegenskaper for de ulike delene av kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the different style properties.
trans-unit.target: Tabellen nedenfor viser egenskapene annen stil.

trans-unit.source: |Style Property|Description| |--------------------|-----------------| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.AlternatingItemStyle%2A>|Specifies the style for alternating items in the DataGrid control.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.EditItemStyle%2A>|Specifies the style for the item being edited in the DataGrid control.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.FooterStyle%2A>|Specifies the style for the footer section in the DataGrid control.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.HeaderStyle%2A>|Specifies the style for the header section in the DataGrid control.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.ItemStyle%2A>|Specifies the style for the items in the DataGrid control.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.PagerStyle%2A>|Specifies the style for the page selection section of the DataGrid control.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.SelectedItemStyle%2A>|Specifies the style for the selected item in the DataGrid control.| You can also show or hide different parts of the control.
trans-unit.target: | Style-egenskapen | Beskrivelse | |--------------------|-----------------| | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.AlternatingItemStyle%2A>| Angir stilen for alternative elementer i DataGrid-kontrollen. | | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.EditItemStyle%2A>| Angir stilen for elementet blir redigert i DataGrid-kontrollen. | | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.FooterStyle%2A>| Angir stilen for bunnteksten i DataGrid-kontrollen. | | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.HeaderStyle%2A>| Angir stilen for toppteksten i DataGrid-kontrollen. | | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.ItemStyle%2A>| Angir stilen for elementene i DataGrid-kontrollen. | | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.PagerStyle%2A>| Angir stilen for delen siden valg av kontrollens DataGrid. | | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.SelectedItemStyle%2A>| Angir stilen for det valgte elementet i DataGrid-kontrollen. | Du kan vise eller skjule ulike delene av kontrollen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.SelectedItemStyle%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.PagerStyle%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.ItemStyle%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.HeaderStyle%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.FooterStyle%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.EditItemStyle%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.AlternatingItemStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the properties that control which parts are shown or hidden.
trans-unit.target: Tabellen nedenfor viser egenskaper som styrer hvilke deler vises eller skjules.

trans-unit.source: |Property|Description| |--------------|-----------------| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.ShowFooter%2A>|Shows or hides the footer section of the DataGrid control.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.ShowHeader%2A>|Shows or hides the header section of the DataGrid control.| You can control the appearance of the DataGrid control by programmatically adding attributes to the `<td>` and `<tr>` tags rendered by the control on the browser.
trans-unit.target: | Egenskapen | Beskrivelse | |--------------|-----------------| | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.ShowFooter%2A>| Viser eller skjuler bunnteksten kontrollens DataGrid. | | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.ShowHeader%2A>| Viser eller skjuler delen hodet kontrollens DataGrid. | Du kan kontrollere utseendet til DataGrid-kontroll ved å legge til attributter programmatisk den `<td>` og `<tr>` koder gjengis av kontrollen i nettleseren.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.ShowHeader%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.ShowFooter%2A>

trans-unit.source: Attributes can be programmatically added by providing code in the event handler for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.OnItemCreated%2A> or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.OnItemDataBound%2A> event.
trans-unit.target: Attributter programmatisk kan legges ved å angi koden i hendelsesbehandlingen for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.OnItemCreated%2A>eller <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.OnItemDataBound%2A>hendelsen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.OnItemDataBound%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.OnItemCreated%2A>

trans-unit.source: To add an attribute to the `<td>` tag, first get the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell> object that represents the cell in the DataGrid control you want to add the attribute to.
trans-unit.target: Legge til et attributt til den `<td>` kode, først får den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell>objektet som representerer cellen i DataGrid-kontrollen du vil legge til attributtet som.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Controls%2A?displayProperty=fullName> collection for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItemEventArgs.Item%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItemEventArgs> object passed into the event handler can be used to get the desired <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell> object.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Controls%2A?displayProperty=fullName>samling for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItemEventArgs.Item%2A>-egenskapen til det <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItemEventArgs>objektet som er sendt til hendelsesbehandlingen kan brukes til å hente den ønskede <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell>objektet.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItemEventArgs> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItemEventArgs.Item%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Controls%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: You can then use the <xref:System.Web.UI.AttributeCollection.Add%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.Attributes%2A> collection for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell> object to add attributes to the `<td>` tag.
trans-unit.target: Deretter kan du bruke den <xref:System.Web.UI.AttributeCollection.Add%2A?displayProperty=fullName>metoden for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.Attributes%2A>samling for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell>objekt for å legge til attributter i `<td>` koden.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.Attributes%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.AttributeCollection.Add%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: To add an attribute to the `<tr>` tag, first get the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItem> object that represents the row in the DataGrid control you want to add the attribute to.
trans-unit.target: Legge til et attributt til den `<tr>` kode, først får den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItem>objektet som representerer raden i DataGrid-kontrollen du vil legge til attributtet som.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItem>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItemEventArgs.Item%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItemEventArgs> object passed into the event handler can be used to get the desired <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItem> object.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItemEventArgs.Item%2A>-egenskapen til det <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItemEventArgs>objektet som er sendt til hendelsesbehandlingen kan brukes til å hente den ønskede <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItem>objektet.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItem> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItemEventArgs> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItemEventArgs.Item%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can then use the <xref:System.Web.UI.AttributeCollection.Add%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.Attributes%2A> collection for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItem> object to add attributes to the `<tr>` tag.
trans-unit.target: Deretter kan du bruke den <xref:System.Web.UI.AttributeCollection.Add%2A?displayProperty=fullName>metoden for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.Attributes%2A>samling for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItem>objekt for å legge til attributter i `<tr>` koden.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItem> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.Attributes%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.AttributeCollection.Add%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: ## Accessibility For information about how to configure this control so that it generates markup that conforms to accessibility standards, see [Accessibility in Visual Studio and ASP.NET](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) and [ASP.NET Controls and Accessibility](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: ## Tilgjengelighet For informasjon om hvordan du konfigurerer denne kontrollen, slik at den genererer markup som overholder tilgjengelighet standarder se [tilgjengelighet i Visual Studio og ASP.NET](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) og [ASP.NET-kontroller og tilgjengelighet](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: ## Declarative Syntax ```                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       ```
trans-unit.target: ## Deklarerende syntaks.```                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       ```

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: Use this constructor to create and initialize a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> class.
trans-unit.target: Bruk denne konstruktøren til å opprette og starte en ny forekomst av <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>klassen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether custom paging is enabled.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som angir om egendefinerte Bla er aktivert.

trans-unit.source: Paging allows you to display the contents of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> control in page segments.
trans-unit.target: Bla gjør det mulig å vise innholdet i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>kontrollen i siden segmenter.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>

trans-unit.source: The number of items on a page is determined by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.PageSize%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Antall elementer på en side fastsettes av den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.PageSize%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.PageSize%2A>

trans-unit.source: If no value is specified for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.PageSize%2A> property, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> will display 10 items on a page.
trans-unit.target: Hvis ingen verdi er angitt for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.PageSize%2A>egenskapen den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>vises 10 elementer på en side.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.PageSize%2A>

trans-unit.source: Normally, a data source that contains every row in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> control is loaded every time the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> control moves to a different page.
trans-unit.target: Vanligvis en datakilde som inneholder hver rad i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>kontrollen lastes hver gang de <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>kontrollen flytter til en annen side.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>

trans-unit.source: This can consume a lot of resources when the data source is very large.
trans-unit.target: Dette kan bruke mye ressurser når datakilden er svært.

trans-unit.source: Custom paging allows you to load just the segment of data needed to display a single page.
trans-unit.target: Egendefinert Bla lar deg laste segmentet data som er nødvendig for å vise én side.

trans-unit.source: To enable custom paging, set both the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.AllowPaging%2A> and AllowCustomPaging properties to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil aktivere egendefinerte Bla, setter du både den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.AllowPaging%2A>og AllowCustomPaging egenskaper for `true`.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.AllowPaging%2A>

trans-unit.source: Next, provide code to handle the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.PageIndexChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: Angi neste kode til å håndtere den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.PageIndexChanged>hendelsen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.PageIndexChanged>

trans-unit.source: The typical logic for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.PageIndexChanged> event handler is to first set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.CurrentPageIndex%2A> property to the index of the page you want to display.
trans-unit.target: Vanlige logikken for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.PageIndexChanged>hendelsesbehandling er først angi den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.CurrentPageIndex%2A>egenskapen indeksen for siden du vil vise.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.CurrentPageIndex%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.PageIndexChanged>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The event handler receives a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridPageChangedEventArgs> object as a parameter.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Hendelsesbehandlingen mottar en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridPageChangedEventArgs>objektet som en parameter.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridPageChangedEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridPageChangedEventArgs.NewPageIndex%2A> property of this parameter to determine the index of the page selected by the user from the page selection elements of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> control.
trans-unit.target: Du kan bruke den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridPageChangedEventArgs.NewPageIndex%2A>for denne parameteren til å bestemme indeksen for siden som er valgt av brukeren fra siden utvalget elementer i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridPageChangedEventArgs.NewPageIndex%2A>

trans-unit.source: Next, create a data source that contains the data to display on a single page and then use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataBind%2A> method to bind the data to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> control.
trans-unit.target: Deretter oppretter du en datakilde som inneholder dataene for å vise på én side, og deretter bruke den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataBind%2A>metode til å binde data til den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataBind%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Because only a segment of the data is loaded, you must set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.VirtualItemCount%2A> property to the total number of items in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> control.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Fordi et segment dataene er lastet inn, må du angi den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.VirtualItemCount%2A>egenskapen antall elementer i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.VirtualItemCount%2A>

trans-unit.source: This allows the control to determine the total number of pages needed to display every item in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> control.
trans-unit.target: Dette gjør det mulig for tilgangskontroll til å avgjøre Totalt antall sider som er nødvendig for å vise alle elementene i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>

trans-unit.source: This property is normally programmatically set once the total number of items in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> control is determined.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen settes vanligvis programmatisk når antall elementer i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>kontrollen er avgjort.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>

trans-unit.source: When paging is enabled with the AllowCustomPaging property is set to `false`, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> control assumes that the data source contains all the items to be displayed.
trans-unit.target: Når Bla er aktivert med AllowCustomPaging-egenskap er satt til `false`, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>kontrollen antar at datakilden inneholder alle elementene som skal vises.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> control calculates the indexes of the items on the displayed page based on the page index, specified by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.CurrentPageIndex%2A> property, and the number of items on a page, specified by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.PageSize%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>kontrollen beregner indekser elementene på siden vises basert på siden-indeksen, som er angitt av den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.CurrentPageIndex%2A>egenskapen og hvor mange elementer på en side, angitt av den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.PageSize%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.PageSize%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.CurrentPageIndex%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>

trans-unit.source: When the AllowCustomPaging property is set to `true`, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> control assumes that the data source only contains the items as determined by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.VirtualItemCount%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Når egenskapen AllowCustomPaging er satt til `true`, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>kontrollen antar at datakilden bare inneholder elementer som avhenger av den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.VirtualItemCount%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.VirtualItemCount%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>

trans-unit.source: All items up to the number of items specified by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.PageSize%2A> property are displayed.
trans-unit.target: Alle elementer opptil antall elementer som er angitt av den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.PageSize%2A>egenskapen vises.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.PageSize%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if custom paging is enabled; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis egendefinerte Bla er aktivert. Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standardverdien er <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether paging is enabled.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som angir om Bla er aktivert.

trans-unit.source: Paging allows you to display the contents of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> control in page segments.
trans-unit.target: Bla gjør det mulig å vise innholdet i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>kontrollen i siden segmenter.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>

trans-unit.source: The number of items on a page is determined by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.PageSize%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Antall elementer på en side fastsettes av den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.PageSize%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.PageSize%2A>

trans-unit.source: If no value is specified for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.PageSize%2A> property, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> control will display 10 items on a page.
trans-unit.target: Hvis ingen verdi er angitt for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.PageSize%2A>egenskapen den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>kontrollen viser 10 elementer på en side.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.PageSize%2A>

trans-unit.source: By default, paging is disabled.
trans-unit.target: Bla er deaktivert som standard.

trans-unit.source: To enable paging, set this property to `true` and provide code to handle the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.PageIndexChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: For å aktivere Bla må sette denne egenskapen til `true` og angi koden til å håndtere den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.PageIndexChanged>hendelsen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.PageIndexChanged>

trans-unit.source: The typical logic for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.PageIndexChanged> event is to set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.CurrentPageIndex%2A> property to the index of the page you want to display and then use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataBind%2A> method to bind the data to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> control.
trans-unit.target: Vanlige logikken for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.PageIndexChanged>hendelsen er å angi den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.CurrentPageIndex%2A>egenskapen indeksen for siden du vil vise og deretter bruke den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataBind%2A>metode til å binde til data til den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataBind%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.CurrentPageIndex%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.PageIndexChanged>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The event handler receives a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridPageChangedEventArgs> object as a parameter.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Hendelsesbehandlingen mottar en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridPageChangedEventArgs>objektet som en parameter.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridPageChangedEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridPageChangedEventArgs.NewPageIndex%2A> property of this parameter to determine the index of the page selected by the user from the page selection elements of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> control.
trans-unit.target: Du kan bruke den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridPageChangedEventArgs.NewPageIndex%2A>for denne parameteren til å bestemme indeksen for siden som er valgt av brukeren fra siden utvalget elementer i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridPageChangedEventArgs.NewPageIndex%2A>

trans-unit.source: With standard paging, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> control assumes that the data source contains all the items to be displayed.
trans-unit.target: Med standard Bla den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>kontrollen antar at datakilden inneholder alle elementene som skal vises.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> control calculates the indexes of the items on the displayed page based on the page index, specified by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.CurrentPageIndex%2A> property, and the number of items of items on a page, specified by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.PageSize%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>kontrollen beregner indekser elementene på siden vises basert på siden-indeksen, som er angitt av den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.CurrentPageIndex%2A>egenskapen og hvor mange elementer i elementer på en side, angitt av den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.PageSize%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.PageSize%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.CurrentPageIndex%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>

trans-unit.source: Normally, a data source that contains all items to be displayed is loaded every time the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> control is paged.
trans-unit.target: Vanligvis en datakilde som inneholder alle elementer som skal vises er lastet inn hver gang de <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>kontrollen sidevekslet.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>

trans-unit.source: This can consume a lot of resources when the data source is very large.
trans-unit.target: Dette kan bruke mye ressurser når datakilden er svært.

trans-unit.source: Custom paging allows you to load just the segment of data needed to display a single page.
trans-unit.target: Egendefinert Bla lar deg laste segmentet data som er nødvendig for å vise én side.

trans-unit.source: For additional information on custom paging, see the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.AllowCustomPaging%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: For mer informasjon om egendefinerte Bla, kan du se den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.AllowCustomPaging%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.AllowCustomPaging%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if paging is enabled; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis Bla er aktivert. Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standardverdien er <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether sorting is enabled.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som angir om sortering er aktivert.

trans-unit.source: When sorting is enabled, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton> controls are rendered in the heading section of each column where the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumn.SortExpression%2A> property is set.
trans-unit.target: Når sortering er aktivert, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton>Kontroller gjengis i delen overskrift for hver kolonne der den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumn.SortExpression%2A>-egenskap er satt.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumn.SortExpression%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton>

trans-unit.source: These <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton> controls allow you to sort the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> control by the selected column.
trans-unit.target: Disse <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton>Kontroller at du vil sortere den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>kontroll av den valgte kolonnen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton>

trans-unit.source: The only exception is when you use a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplateColumn> column type with the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplateColumn.HeaderTemplate%2A> property set.
trans-unit.target: Det eneste unntaket er når du bruker en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplateColumn>Kolonnetype med den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplateColumn.HeaderTemplate%2A>egenskapen angitt.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplateColumn.HeaderTemplate%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplateColumn>

trans-unit.source: In this case, you must provide a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button> control in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplateColumn.HeaderTemplate%2A> of the column.
trans-unit.target: I dette tilfellet du må oppgi en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button>kontrollerer i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplateColumn.HeaderTemplate%2A>i kolonnen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplateColumn.HeaderTemplate%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.SortCommand> event is raised when one of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton> controls is clicked.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.SortCommand>denne hendelsen oppstår når det er én av de <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton>Kontroller klikkes.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.SortCommand>

trans-unit.source: It is up to you to provide code for the event handler.
trans-unit.target: Det er mulig å angi koden for hendelsesbehandlingen.

trans-unit.source: The typical logic for the handler is to sort the list, and then rebind the data to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> control.
trans-unit.target: Vanlige logikken for behandlingsprogrammet er å sortere listen og binde til data til den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if sorting is enabled; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis sortering er aktivert. Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standardverdien er <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the style properties for alternating items in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Henter stilegenskaper for alternative elementer i den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: Use the AlternatingItemStyle property to provide a custom style for the alternating items in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> control.
trans-unit.target: Bruk AlternatingItemStyle-egenskapen for å angi en egendefinert stil for vekslende elementer i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>

trans-unit.source: Common style attributes that can be adjusted include forecolor, backcolor, font, and content alignment within the cell.
trans-unit.target: Felles Stilattributter som kan justeres inkluderer forecolor, bakgrunnsfarge, skrift og justering av kolonneinnhold i cellen.

trans-unit.source: Providing a different style enhances the appearance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> control.
trans-unit.target: Gir en annen stil forbedrer utseendet til den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>

trans-unit.source: Item style properties in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> control are inherited from one item style property to another through a hierarchy.
trans-unit.target: Element stilegenskaper i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>kontrollen er arvet fra ett element-stilegenskap til en annen via et hierarki.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>

trans-unit.source: Item style properties set lower in the hierarchy are inherited by item style properties higher in the hierarchy.
trans-unit.target: Elementet stilegenskaper angitt lavere i hierarkiet arves av elementet stilegenskaper høyere i hierarkiet.

trans-unit.source: For example, if you specify a red font for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.ItemStyle%2A> property, all other item style properties in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> control will also have a red font.
trans-unit.target: For eksempel hvis du angir en røde skrift for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.ItemStyle%2A>egenskapen, alle andre elementet stilegenskaper i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>kontrollen har også et rødt.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.ItemStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: This allows you to provide a common appearance for the control by setting a single item style property.
trans-unit.target: Dette gjør at du må oppgi et felles utseende for kontrollen ved å angi et enkelt element-stilegenskap.

trans-unit.source: You can override the inherited style settings for an item style property that is higher in the hierarchy by setting its style properties.
trans-unit.target: Du kan overstyre arvede stilinnstillingene for en element-stilegenskap som er høyere i hierarkiet ved å angi egenskapene stil.

trans-unit.source: For example, you can specify a blue font for the AlternatingItemStyle property, overriding the red font specified in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.ItemStyle%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: For eksempel kan du angi en blå skrift for egenskapen AlternatingItemStyle, overstyrer røde skriften angitt i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.ItemStyle%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.ItemStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the hierarchy order from highest to lowest.
trans-unit.target: Tabellen nedenfor viser hierarkiet rekkefølge fra høyeste til laveste.

trans-unit.source: |Precedence|Style Property| |----------------|--------------------| |1|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.EditItemStyle%2A>| |2|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.SelectedItemStyle%2A>| |3|AlternatingItemStyle| |4|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.ItemStyle%2A>| |5|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.ControlStyle%2A>| To specify a custom style for the alternating items, place the `<AlternatingItemStyle>` tags between the opening and closing tags of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> control.
trans-unit.target: | Prioriteten | Style-egenskapen | |----------------|--------------------| |&1; | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.EditItemStyle%2A>| |&2; | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.SelectedItemStyle%2A>| |&3; | AlternatingItemStyle | |&4; | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.ItemStyle%2A>| |&5; | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.ControlStyle%2A>| Hvis du vil angi en egendefinert stil for vekslende elementer, kan du plassere den `<AlternatingItemStyle>` koder mellom innledende og avsluttende koder for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.ControlStyle%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.ItemStyle%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.SelectedItemStyle%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.EditItemStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can then list the style attributes within the opening `<AlternatingItemStyle>` tag.
trans-unit.target: Du kan deretter Vis stil attributtene i innledende `<AlternatingItemStyle>` koden.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle"></xref> object that represents the style properties for alternating items in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle"> </xref> objektet som representerer stilegenskaper for alternative elementer i den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default value is an empty <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Standardverdien er en tom <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle"> </xref> objektet.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundColumn"></xref> objects are automatically created and displayed in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid"></xref> control for each field in the data source.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som angir om <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundColumn"> </xref> objekter som opprettes automatisk og vises i den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid"> </xref> kontroll for hvert felt i datakilden.

trans-unit.source: Use this property to automatically create a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundColumn> object for each field in the data source.
trans-unit.target: Bruk denne egenskapen til automatisk for å opprette en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundColumn>objekt for hvert felt i datakilden.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundColumn>

trans-unit.source: Each field is then rendered as a column in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> control in the order that the fields appear in the data source.
trans-unit.target: Hvert felt deretter gjengis som en kolonne i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>kontrollen i rekkefølgen som vises på feltene i datakilden.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>

trans-unit.source: Not all data types can be bound to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> control.
trans-unit.target: Ikke alle datatyper som kan bindes til det <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>

trans-unit.source: If a field contains an unsupported data type, a column is not created for that field.
trans-unit.target: Hvis et felt inneholder en Ustøttet datatype, opprettes ikke en kolonne for dette feltet.

trans-unit.source: If the data source only contains one column with an unsupported data type, an exception is thrown.
trans-unit.target: Hvis datakilden inneholder bare én kolonne med en datatype som ikke støttes, er det et unntak som er registrert.

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the data types that can be bound to the control.
trans-unit.target: Tabellen nedenfor viser datatypene som kan bindes til kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: |Data Type|Description| |---------------|-----------------| |Primitives|A primitive data type, such as <xref:System.Int32?displayProperty=fullName>, <xref:System.Char>, <xref:System.Double>, and so on.
trans-unit.target: | Datatypen | Beskrivelse | |---------------|-----------------| | Primitivene | En primitiv datatypen, slik som <xref:System.Int32?displayProperty=fullName>, <xref:System.Char>, <xref:System.Double>og så videre.</xref:System.Double> </xref:System.Char> </xref:System.Int32?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: For a complete list, see <xref:System.Type.IsPrimitive%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.| |String|A <xref:System.String?displayProperty=fullName> object.| |DateTime|A <xref:System.DateTime?displayProperty=fullName> object.| |Decimal|A <xref:System.Decimal?displayProperty=fullName> object.| > [!NOTE] > Explicitly declared columns may be used in conjunction with auto-generated columns.
trans-unit.target: En fullstendig liste, kan du se <xref:System.Type.IsPrimitive%2A?displayProperty=fullName>. | | Streng | Et objekt for <xref:System.String?displayProperty=fullName>. | | DateTime | Et objekt for <xref:System.DateTime?displayProperty=fullName>. | | Decimal | Et objekt for <xref:System.Decimal?displayProperty=fullName>. | > [!NOTE] > Eksplisitt deklarert kolonner kan brukes sammen med kolonner som er automatisk generert.</xref:System.Decimal?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.DateTime?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.String?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Type.IsPrimitive%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the URL of an image to display in the background of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir URL-adressen til et bilde som skal vises i bakgrunn for den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: Use the BackImageUrl property to specify an image to display in the background of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> control.
trans-unit.target: Bruk BackImageUrl-egenskapen til å angi et bilde som skal vises i bakgrunn for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > If the specified image is smaller than the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> control, the image will tile to fill in the background of the control.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Hvis det angitte bildet er mindre enn den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>kontroll, plasseres bildet slik at det fyller i bakgrunnen for kontrollen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>

trans-unit.source: The URL of an image to display in the background of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid"></xref> control.

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref:System.String.Empty?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Standardverdien er <xref:System.String.Empty?displayProperty=fullName>.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <xref uid="langword_csharp_Cancel" name="Cancel" href=""></xref> button is clicked for an item in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når den <xref uid="langword_csharp_Cancel" name="Cancel" href=""> </xref> knappen klikkes for et element i den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: The CancelCommand event is raised when the `Cancel` button is clicked for an item in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> control.
trans-unit.target: CancelCommand denne hendelsen oppstår når den `Cancel` knappen klikkes for et element i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>

trans-unit.source: A typical handler for the CancelCommand event sets the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.EditItemIndex%2A> property to `-1` (to deselect the item) and then rebinds the data to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> control.
trans-unit.target: Et vanlig behandlingsprogram for CancelCommand hendelsen angir den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.EditItemIndex%2A>egenskapen `-1` (for å oppheve elementet) og rebinds data til den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.EditItemIndex%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!CAUTION] > Text is not HTML encoded before it is displayed in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> control.
trans-unit.target: > [!CAUTION] > Text er ikke HTML-kodede før den vises i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>

trans-unit.source: This makes it possible to embed script within HTML tags in the text.
trans-unit.target: Dette gjør det mulig å bygge inn skriptet i HTML-koder i teksten.

trans-unit.target: Hvis verdiene for kontrollen kommer fra brukerinndata, må du validere verdiene for å redusere sikkerhetsproblemer.

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of objects that represent the columns of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Henter en samling med objekter som representerer kolonnene i den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: Use this property to programmatically control the collection of columns in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> control.
trans-unit.target: Bruk denne egenskapen til å kontrollere programmatisk samlingen av kolonner i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>

trans-unit.source: The Columns collection contains explicitly declared columns that get rendered in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> control.
trans-unit.target: Kolonner-samlingen inneholder eksplisitt deklarerte kolonner som få gjengis i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Explicitly declared columns may be used in conjunction with automatically generated columns.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Eksplisitt deklarerte kolonner som kan brukes sammen med kolonner som er automatisk generert.

trans-unit.source: When using both, explicitly declared columns will be rendered first, followed by the automatically generated columns.
trans-unit.target: Når du bruker både eksplisitt deklarert kolonner blir gjengitt først, etterfulgt av de automatisk genererte kolonnene.

trans-unit.source: Automatically generated columns are not added to the Columns collection.
trans-unit.target: Automatisk genererte kolonner er ikke lagt til samlingen kolonner.

trans-unit.source: The order that the columns are displayed in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> control is controlled by the order that the columns appear in the Columns collection.
trans-unit.target: Rekkefølgen som vises i kolonnene i <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>kontrollen styres av rekkefølgen for kolonnene i samlingen kolonner.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the different column classes that derive from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumn> class and can be used in the Columns collection.
trans-unit.target: Tabellen nedenfor viser annen kolonne klassene som avledes fra de <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumn>klasse og kan brukes i samlingen kolonner.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumn>

trans-unit.source: |Column type|Description| |-----------------|-----------------| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundColumn>|Displays a column bound to a field in a data source.
trans-unit.target: | Kolonnetypen | Beskrivelse | |-----------------|-----------------| | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundColumn>| Viser en kolonne som er bundet til et felt i en datakilde.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundColumn>

trans-unit.source: It displays each item in the field as text.
trans-unit.target: Den viser hvert element i feltet som tekst.

trans-unit.source: This is the default column type of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> control.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonColumn>|Displays a command button for each item in the column.
trans-unit.target: Dette er standard kolonnetypen kontrollens <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>. | | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonColumn>| Viser en kommandoknapp for hvert element i kolonnen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonColumn> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>

trans-unit.source: This allows you to create a column of custom button controls, such as the `Add` or `Remove` button.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EditCommandColumn>|Displays a column that contains editing commands for each item in the column.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLinkColumn>|Displays the contents of each item in the column as a hyperlink.
trans-unit.target: Dette gjør at du kan opprette en kolonne med egendefinerte kontrollene, for eksempel den `Add` eller `Remove` knappen. | | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EditCommandColumn>| Viser en kolonne som inneholder redigering kommandoer for hvert element i kolonnen. | | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLinkColumn>| Viser innholdet i hvert element i kolonnen som hyperkobling.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLinkColumn> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EditCommandColumn>

trans-unit.source: The contents of the column can be bound to a field in a data source or static text.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplateColumn>|Displays each item in the column following a specified template.
trans-unit.target: Innholdet i kolonnen kan bindes til et felt i en datakilde eller statisk tekst. | | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplateColumn>| Viser hvert element i kolonnen som samsvarer med en angitt mal.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplateColumn>

trans-unit.source: This allows you to provide custom controls in the column.| > [!NOTE] > Although you can programmatically add columns to the Columns collection, it is easier to list the columns statically and then use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumn.Visible%2A> property to show or hide the column.
trans-unit.target: Dette lar deg angi egendefinerte kontroller i kolonnen. | > [!NOTE] > Selv om du kan legge til kolonner programmatisk i samlingen kolonner, er det enklere å vise kolonnene statisk og deretter bruke den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumn.Visible%2A>til å vise eller skjule kolonnen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumn.Visible%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumnCollection"></xref> object that contains a collection of objects that represent the columns of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumnCollection"> </xref> objekt som inneholder en samling av objekter som representerer kolonnene i den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: Creates the set of columns to be used to build up the control hierarchy.
trans-unit.target: Oppretter Kolonnesettet som brukes til å bygge opp kontrollen hierarkiet.

trans-unit.source: When <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.AutoGenerateColumns*> is true, the columns are created to match the data source and are appended to the set of columns defined in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.Columns*> collection.
trans-unit.target: Når <> </> *> er true, kolonnene er opprettet for å samsvare med datakilden, og legges til settet med kolonner som er definert i den <> </> *> samling.

trans-unit.source: The data source being used to create the control hierarchy
trans-unit.target: Datakilden som brukes til å opprette kontrollhierarki

trans-unit.source: Whether to use the data source to generate columns automatically or to use saved state.
trans-unit.target: Om datakilden til å generere kolonner automatisk eller bruke lagret tilstand.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Collections.ArrayList"></xref> containing the effective set of columns in the right order.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Collections.ArrayList"> </xref> som inneholder gjeldende settet med kolonner i riktig rekkefølge.

trans-unit.source: Creates the control hierarchy that is used to render the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Oppretter kontrollen hierarkiet som brukes til å gjengi den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: This implementation assumes that all the children in the controls collection have already been cleared.
trans-unit.target: Denne implementeringen antar at alle underordnede elementer i kontrollsamlingen allerede er fjernet.

trans-unit.source: Whether to use the data source to generate columns automatically or to use saved state.
trans-unit.target: Om datakilden til å generere kolonner automatisk eller bruke lagret tilstand.

trans-unit.source: Creates new control style.
trans-unit.target: Oppretter ny kontrollstil.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style"></xref> the represents the new style.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style"> </xref> representerer ny stil.

trans-unit.source: Creates a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItem"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Oppretter en <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItem"> </xref> objektet.

trans-unit.source: The CreateItem is a helper method used by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> class to create its <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItem> objects.
trans-unit.target: CreateItem er helper metode som brukes av den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>klassen for å opprette den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItem>objekter.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItem> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > This method is primarily used by control developers.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Denne metoden brukes hovedsakelig av kontrollutviklere.

trans-unit.source: The index for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItem"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Indeksen for den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItem"> </xref> objektet.

trans-unit.source: The index of the data item from the data source.
trans-unit.target: Indeksen for dataelementet fra datakilden.

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItemType"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Én av de <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItemType"> </xref> verdier.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItem"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItem"></xref> object.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the index of the currently displayed page.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir indeksen for siden som vises.

trans-unit.source: Use this property to determine the currently displayed page in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> control when paging is enabled.
trans-unit.target: Bruk denne egenskapen til å fastslå den viste siden i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>kontrollerer når Bla er aktivert.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>

trans-unit.source: This property is also used to programmatically control which page is displayed.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen brukes også til å kontrollere programmatisk som vises.

trans-unit.source: You can also hide the built in paging controls and create custom controls.
trans-unit.target: Du kan også skjule det innebygde i Bla kontroller og opprette egendefinerte kontroller.

trans-unit.source: To display a specific page, set this property to the page index you want to display and then rebind the data to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> control.
trans-unit.target: For å vise en bestemt side, kan du angi denne egenskapen i indeksen for siden du vil vise og binde til data til den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the page currently displayed.
trans-unit.target: Den nullbaserte indeksen for siden som vises.

trans-unit.source: The specified page index is a negative value.
trans-unit.target: Den angitte sideindeksen er en negativ verdi.
