trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the index of an item in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid"></xref> control to edit.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir indeksen for et element i den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid"> </xref> kontroll for redigering.

trans-unit.source: Use the EditItemIndex property when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> control contains an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EditCommandColumn> to determine the index of the item selected in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> control to edit.
trans-unit.target: Bruke egenskapen EditItemIndex når <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>kontrollen inneholder en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EditCommandColumn>valgte <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>kontrollen vil</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> ikke fastsette indeksen for elementet</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EditCommandColumn> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>

trans-unit.source: This property is also used to programmatically control which item is being edited.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen brukes også til å kontrollere programmatisk som redigeres.

trans-unit.source: Setting this property to an index of an item in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> control will enable editing controls for that item in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EditCommandColumn>.
trans-unit.target: Når egenskapen settes til en indeks for et element i <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>kontrollen skal aktivere redigering kontroller for elementet i <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EditCommandColumn>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EditCommandColumn> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The EditItemIndex property is zero based.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > I EditItemIndex-egenskapen er nullbasert.

trans-unit.source: To cancel editing, programmatically set this property to -1.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil avbryte redigering programmatisk denne egenskapen settes til -1.

trans-unit.source: > [!CAUTION] > Text is not HTML encoded before it is displayed in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> control.
trans-unit.target: > [!CAUTION] > Text er ikke HTML-kodede før den vises i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>

trans-unit.source: This makes it possible to embed script within HTML tags in the text.
trans-unit.target: Dette gjør det mulig å bygge inn skriptet i HTML-koder i teksten.

trans-unit.source: If the values for the control come from user input, be sure to validate the values to reduce security vulnerabilities.
trans-unit.target: Hvis verdiene for kontrollen kommer fra brukerinndata, må du validere verdiene for å redusere sikkerhetsproblemer.

trans-unit.source: The index of an item in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid"></xref> control to edit.
trans-unit.target: Indeksen for et element i den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid"> </xref> kontroll for redigering.

trans-unit.source: The default value is -1, which indicates that no item in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid"></xref> control is being edited.
trans-unit.target: Standardverdien er -1, som angir at ingen elementer i den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid"> </xref> kontrollen redigeres.

trans-unit.source: The specified index is less than -1.
trans-unit.target: Den angitte indeksen er mindre enn -1.

trans-unit.source: Gets the style properties of the item selected for editing in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Henter stilegenskaper til det valgte for redigering i elementet i <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: Use the EditItemStyle property to provide a custom style for the item selected for editing in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> control.
trans-unit.target: Bruk EditItemStyle-egenskapen for å angi en egendefinert stil for elementet som er valgt for redigering i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>

trans-unit.source: Common style attributes that can be adjusted include forecolor, backcolor, font, and content alignment within the cell.
trans-unit.target: Felles Stilattributter som kan justeres inkluderer forecolor, bakgrunnsfarge, skrift og justering av kolonneinnhold i cellen.

trans-unit.source: Providing a different style enhances the appearance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> control.
trans-unit.target: Gir en annen stil forbedrer utseendet til den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>

trans-unit.source: Item style properties in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> control are inherited from one item style property to another through a hierarchy.
trans-unit.target: Element stilegenskaper i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>kontrollen er arvet fra ett element-stilegenskap til en annen via et hierarki.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>

trans-unit.source: Item style properties set lower in the hierarchy are inherited by item style properties higher in the hierarchy.
trans-unit.target: Elementet stilegenskaper angitt lavere i hierarkiet arves av elementet stilegenskaper høyere i hierarkiet.

trans-unit.source: For example, if you specify a red font for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.ItemStyle%2A> property, all other item style properties in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> control will also have a red font.
trans-unit.target: For eksempel hvis du angir en røde skrift for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.ItemStyle%2A>egenskapen, alle andre elementet stilegenskaper i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>kontrollen har også et rødt.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.ItemStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: This allows you to provide a common appearance for the control by setting a single item style property.
trans-unit.target: Dette gjør at du må oppgi et felles utseende for kontrollen ved å angi et enkelt element-stilegenskap.

trans-unit.source: You can override the inherited style settings for an item style property that is higher in the hierarchy by setting its style properties.
trans-unit.target: Du kan overstyre arvede stilinnstillingene for en element-stilegenskap som er høyere i hierarkiet ved å angi egenskapene stil.

trans-unit.source: For example, you can specify a blue font for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.AlternatingItemStyle%2A> property, overriding the red font specified in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.ItemStyle%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: For eksempel kan du angi en blå skrift for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.AlternatingItemStyle%2A>egenskapen overstyrer rødt som er angitt i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.ItemStyle%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.ItemStyle%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.AlternatingItemStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the hierarchy order from highest to lowest.
trans-unit.target: Tabellen nedenfor viser hierarkiet rekkefølge fra høyeste til laveste.

trans-unit.source: |Precedence|Style Property| |----------------|--------------------| |1|EditItemStyle| |2|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.SelectedItemStyle%2A>| |3|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.AlternatingItemStyle%2A>| |4|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.ItemStyle%2A>| |5|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.ControlStyle%2A>| To specify a custom style for the item selected for editing, place the `<EditItemStyle>` tags between the opening and closing tags of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> control.
trans-unit.target: | Prioriteten | Style-egenskapen | |----------------|--------------------| |&1; | EditItemStyle | |&2; | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.SelectedItemStyle%2A>| |&3; | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.AlternatingItemStyle%2A>| |&4; | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.ItemStyle%2A>| |&5; | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.ControlStyle%2A>| Hvis du vil angi en egendefinert stil for elementet som er valgt for redigering, kan du plassere den `<EditItemStyle>` koder mellom innledende og avsluttende koder for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.ControlStyle%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.ItemStyle%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.AlternatingItemStyle%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.SelectedItemStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can then list the style attributes within the opening `<EditItemStyle>` tag.
trans-unit.target: Du kan deretter Vis stil attributtene i innledende `<EditItemStyle>` koden.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle"></xref> object that contains the style properties of the item selected for editing in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle"> </xref> objekt som inneholder stilegenskaper til det valgte for redigering i elementet i <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: The default value is an empty <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Standardverdien er en tom <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle"> </xref> objektet.

trans-unit.source: Gets the style properties of the footer section in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Henter stilegenskaper i bunntekstinndelingen i den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: Use this property to provide a custom style for the footer of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> control.
trans-unit.target: Bruk denne egenskapen til å angi en egendefinert stil for bunntekst for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>

trans-unit.source: Common style attributes that can be adjusted include forecolor, backcolor, font, and content alignment within the cell.
trans-unit.target: Felles Stilattributter som kan justeres inkluderer forecolor, bakgrunnsfarge, skrift og justering av kolonneinnhold i cellen.

trans-unit.source: Providing a different style enhances the appearance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> control.
trans-unit.target: Gir en annen stil forbedrer utseendet til den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>

trans-unit.source: The FooterStyle property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> control inherits the style settings of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.ControlStyle%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen FooterStyle for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>kontrollen arver stilinnstillingene for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.ControlStyle%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.ControlStyle%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>

trans-unit.source: For example, if you specify a red font for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.ControlStyle%2A> property, the FooterStyle property will also have a red font.
trans-unit.target: For eksempel hvis du angir en rødt for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.ControlStyle%2A>egenskapen egenskapen FooterStyle har også et rødt.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.ControlStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: This allows you to provide a common appearance for the control by setting a single style property.
trans-unit.target: Dette gjør at du må oppgi et felles utseende for kontrollen ved å angi et enkelt stilegenskap.

trans-unit.source: You can override the inherited style settings by setting the FooterStyle property.
trans-unit.target: Du kan overstyre arvede stilinnstillingene ved å angi egenskapen FooterStyle.

trans-unit.source: For example, you can specify a blue font for the FooterStyle property, overriding the red font specified in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.ControlStyle%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: For eksempel kan du angi en blå skrift for egenskapen FooterStyle, overstyrer røde skriften angitt i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.ControlStyle%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.ControlStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: To specify a custom style for the footer section, place the `<FooterStyle>` tags between the opening and closing tags of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> control.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil angi en egendefinert stil for bunnteksten, kan du plassere den `<FooterStyle>` koder mellom innledende og avsluttende koder for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>

trans-unit.source: You can then list the style attributes within the opening `<FooterStyle>` tag.
trans-unit.target: Du kan deretter Vis stil attributtene i innledende `<FooterStyle>` koden.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.ShowFooter%2A> property must be set to `true` for this property to be visible.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.ShowFooter%2A>egenskapen må være satt til `true` for denne egenskapen skal være synlig.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.ShowFooter%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle"></xref> object that contains the style properties of the footer section of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle"> </xref> objekt som inneholder egenskapene stilen for bunntekstdelen i den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: The default value is an empty <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Standardverdien er en tom <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle"> </xref> objektet.

trans-unit.target: Henter stilegenskaper for overskrift-delen i den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: Use this property to provide a custom style for the heading section of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> control.
trans-unit.target: Bruk denne egenskapen til å lage en egendefinert stil for overskrift-del av den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>

trans-unit.source: Common style attributes that can be adjusted include forecolor, backcolor, font, and content alignment within the cell.
trans-unit.target: Felles Stilattributter som kan justeres inkluderer forecolor, bakgrunnsfarge, skrift og justering av kolonneinnhold i cellen.

trans-unit.target: Gir en annen stil forbedrer utseendet til den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>

trans-unit.source: The HeaderStyle property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> control inherits the style settings of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.ControlStyle%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen HeaderStyle for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>kontrollen arver stilinnstillingene for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.ControlStyle%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.ControlStyle%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>

trans-unit.source: For example, if you specify a red font for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.ControlStyle%2A> property, the HeaderStyle property will also have a red font.
trans-unit.target: For eksempel hvis du angir en rødt for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.ControlStyle%2A>egenskapen egenskapen HeaderStyle har også et rødt.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.ControlStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: This allows you to provide a common appearance for the control by setting a single style property.
trans-unit.target: Dette gjør at du må oppgi et felles utseende for kontrollen ved å angi et enkelt stilegenskap.

trans-unit.source: You can override the inherited style settings by setting the HeaderStyle property.
trans-unit.target: Du kan overstyre arvede stilinnstillingene ved å angi egenskapen HeaderStyle.

trans-unit.source: For example, you can specify a blue font for the HeaderStyle property, overriding the red font specified in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.ControlStyle%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: For eksempel kan du angi en blå skrift for egenskapen HeaderStyle, overstyrer røde skriften angitt i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.ControlStyle%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.ControlStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: To specify a custom style for the heading section, place the `<HeaderStyle>` tags between the opening and closing tags of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> control.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil angi en egendefinert stil for overskrift-delen, kan du plassere den `<HeaderStyle>` koder mellom innledende og avsluttende koder for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>

trans-unit.source: You can then list the style attributes within the opening `<HeaderStyle>` tag.
trans-unit.target: Du kan deretter Vis stil attributtene i innledende `<HeaderStyle>` koden.

trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.ShowHeader%2A>egenskapen må være satt til `true` for denne egenskapen skal være synlig.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.ShowHeader%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle"></xref> object that contains the style properties of the heading section in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle"> </xref> objekt som inneholder stilegenskaper for overskrift-delen i den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.target: Standardverdien er en tom <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle"> </xref> objektet.

trans-unit.source: Initializes the specified <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItem"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer angitt <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItem"> </xref> objektet.

trans-unit.source: The InitializeItem method is a helper method used by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> class to initialize the specified <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItem> object.
trans-unit.target: Metoden InitializeItem er helper metode som brukes av den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>klassen for å initialisere den angitte <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItem>objektet.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItem> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > This method is primarily used by control developers.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Denne metoden brukes hovedsakelig av kontrollutviklere.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItem"></xref> to initialize.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItem"> </xref> ikke initialisert.

trans-unit.source: An array of <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumn"></xref> objects that contains the columns in this <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: En matrise av <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumn"> </xref> objekter som inneholder kolonner i dette <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: Creates a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItem"></xref> object that contains the paging UI.
trans-unit.target: Oppretter en <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItem"> </xref> objekt som inneholder Bla Brukergrensesnittet.

trans-unit.source: The paging UI is a navigation bar that is a built into a single <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell> that spans across all columns of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> control.
trans-unit.target: Bla Brukergrensesnittet er et navigasjonsfelt som er bygd i én <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell>som dekker på tvers av alle kolonnene i en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell>

trans-unit.source: The InitializePager method is a helper method used by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> class to create the pager row.
trans-unit.target: Metoden InitializePager er helper metode som brukes av den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>klassen for å opprette raden personsøker.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > This method is primarily used by control developers.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Denne metoden brukes hovedsakelig av kontrollutviklere.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItem"></xref> that contains the pager.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItem"> </xref> som inneholder sideveksling.

trans-unit.source: The number of columns to span the pager.
trans-unit.target: Antall kolonner som skal span sideveksling.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.PagedDataSource"></xref> that contains the properties for the pager.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.PagedDataSource"> </xref> som inneholder egenskapene for sideveksling.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when any button is clicked in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når noen-knappen i den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: The ItemCommand event is raised when any button is clicked in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> control.
trans-unit.target: ItemCommand-hendelsen oppstår når noen-knappen i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>

trans-unit.source: This event is commonly used to handle buttons controls with a custom CommandName value, such as Add, in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> control.
trans-unit.target: Denne hendelsen brukes vanligvis til å håndtere knappene kontroller med en egendefinert kommandonavn-verdi, for eksempel Legg til i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om behandling av hendelser [NIB: bruker hendelser](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Occurs on the server when an item in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid"></xref> control is created.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer på serveren når et element i den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid"> </xref> kontrollen er opprettet.

trans-unit.source: The ItemCreated event is raised when an item in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> control is created, both during round-trips and at the time data is bound to the control.
trans-unit.target: ItemCreated denne hendelsen oppstår når et element i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>kontrollen er opprettet, under gå veien om og da dataene er bundet til kontrollen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>

trans-unit.source: The ItemCreated event is commonly used to control the content and appearance of a row in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> control.
trans-unit.target: Hendelsen ItemCreated brukes vanligvis til å kontrollere innholdet og utseendet til en rad i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om behandling av hendelser [NIB: bruker hendelser](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Occurs after an item is data bound to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når et element er databundet til den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: The ItemDataBound event is raised after an item is data bound to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> control.
trans-unit.target: ItemDataBound denne hendelsen oppstår når et element er databundet til den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>

trans-unit.source: This event provides you with the last opportunity to access the data item before it is displayed on the client.
trans-unit.target: Denne hendelsen gir deg siste muligheten til å få tilgang til dataelementet før den vises på klienten.

trans-unit.source: After this event is raised, the data item is nulled out and no longer available.
trans-unit.target: Når denne hendelsen oppstår, nulled dataelementet ut og ikke lenger tilgjengelig.

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItem"></xref> objects that represent the individual items in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Henter en samling av <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItem"> </xref> objekter som representerer individuelle elementer i den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: Use the Items collection to programmatically control the items in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> control.
trans-unit.target: Bruk av elementsamlingen til å kontrollere programmatisk elementene i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>

trans-unit.source: The Items collection does not provide any methods to add or remove items to the collection.
trans-unit.target: Elementsamlingen inneholder ikke noen metoder for å legge til eller fjerne elementer i samlingen.

trans-unit.source: However, you can control the contents of an item by providing a handler for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.ItemCreated> event.
trans-unit.target: Du kan imidlertid kontrollere innholdet i et element ved å gi et behandlingsprogram for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.ItemCreated>hendelsen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.ItemCreated>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Only items bound to the data source are contained in the Items collection.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Bare elementer som er bundet til datakilden finnes i elementsamlingen.

trans-unit.source: The header, footer, and separator are not included in the collection.
trans-unit.target: Topptekst, bunntekst og skilletegn inkluderes ikke i samlingen.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItemCollection"></xref> that contains a collection of <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItem"></xref> objects representing the individual items in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItemCollection"> </xref> som inneholder en samling av <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItem"> </xref> objekter som representerer individuelle elementer i den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: Gets the style properties of the items in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Henter stilegenskaper elementene i den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: Use this property to provide a custom style for the items of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> control.
trans-unit.target: Bruk denne egenskapen til å angi en egendefinert stil for elementene for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>

trans-unit.source: Common style attributes that can be adjusted include forecolor, backcolor, font, and content alignment within the cell.
trans-unit.target: Felles Stilattributter som kan justeres inkluderer forecolor, bakgrunnsfarge, skrift og justering av kolonneinnhold i cellen.

trans-unit.source: Providing a different style enhances the appearance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> control.
trans-unit.target: Gir en annen stil forbedrer utseendet til den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>

trans-unit.source: Item style properties in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> control are inherited from one item style property to another through a hierarchy.
trans-unit.target: Element stilegenskaper i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>kontrollen er arvet fra ett element-stilegenskap til en annen via et hierarki.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>

trans-unit.source: Item style properties set lower in the hierarchy are inherited by item style properties higher in the hierarchy.
trans-unit.target: Elementet stilegenskaper angitt lavere i hierarkiet arves av elementet stilegenskaper høyere i hierarkiet.

trans-unit.source: For example, if you specify a red font for the ItemStyle property, all other item style properties in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> control will also have a red font.
trans-unit.target: For eksempel hvis du angir en rødt for egenskapen ItemStyle, annet element style egenskaper i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>kontrollen har også et rødt.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>

trans-unit.source: This allows you to provide a common appearance for the control by setting a single item style property.
trans-unit.target: Dette gjør at du må oppgi et felles utseende for kontrollen ved å angi et enkelt element-stilegenskap.

trans-unit.source: You can override the inherited style settings for an item style property that is higher in the hierarchy by setting its style properties.
trans-unit.target: Du kan overstyre arvede stilinnstillingene for en element-stilegenskap som er høyere i hierarkiet ved å angi egenskapene stil.

trans-unit.source: For example, you can specify a blue font for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.AlternatingItemStyle%2A> property, overriding the red font specified in the ItemStyle property.
trans-unit.target: For eksempel kan du angi en blå skrift for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.AlternatingItemStyle%2A>egenskapen overstyrer rødt som er angitt i egenskapen ItemStyle.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.AlternatingItemStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the hierarchy order from highest to lowest.
trans-unit.target: Tabellen nedenfor viser hierarkiet rekkefølge fra høyeste til laveste.

trans-unit.source: |Precedence|Style Property| |----------------|--------------------| |1|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.EditItemStyle%2A>| |2|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.SelectedItemStyle%2A>| |3|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.AlternatingItemStyle%2A>| |4|ItemStyle| |5|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.ControlStyle%2A>| To specify a custom style for the items of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> control, place the `<ItemStyle>` tags between the opening and closing tags of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> control.
trans-unit.target: | Prioriteten | Style-egenskapen | |----------------|--------------------| |&1; | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.EditItemStyle%2A>| |&2; | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.SelectedItemStyle%2A>| |&3; | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.AlternatingItemStyle%2A>| |&4; | ItemStyle | |&5; | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.ControlStyle%2A>| Til å angi en egendefinert stil for elementene i <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>kontrollerer, kan du plassere den `<ItemStyle>` koder mellom innledende og avsluttende koder for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.ControlStyle%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.AlternatingItemStyle%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.SelectedItemStyle%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.EditItemStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can then list the style attributes within the opening `<ItemStyle>` tag.
trans-unit.target: Du kan deretter Vis stil attributtene i innledende `<ItemStyle>` koden.

trans-unit.source: You can also use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.AlternatingItemStyle%2A> property to provide a different appearance for the alternating items in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> control.
trans-unit.target: Du kan også bruke den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.AlternatingItemStyle%2A>til å angi et annet utseende for den alternative elementer i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.AlternatingItemStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle"></xref> object that contains the style properties of the items in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle"> </xref> objekt som inneholder stilegenskaper elementene i den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: The default value is an empty <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Standardverdien er en tom <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle"> </xref> objektet.

trans-unit.source: Loads a saved state of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Laster inn en lagret tilstand for den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: A saved state of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: En lagret tilstand for den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Represents the Next command argument.
trans-unit.target: Representerer argumentet neste kommando.

trans-unit.source: This field is read-only.
trans-unit.target: Dette feltet er skrivebeskyttet.

trans-unit.source: Use the NextPageCommandArgument field to represent the Next command argument.
trans-unit.target: Bruk feltet NextPageCommandArgument for å representere argumentet neste kommando.

trans-unit.source: Passes the event raised by a control within the container up the page's UI server control hierarchy.
trans-unit.target: Sender hendelsen som opprettes av en kontroll i beholderen sidens Brukergrensesnittet server kontrollen hierarkiet.

trans-unit.source: Use the OnBubbleEvent method to pass an event raised by a control within the container up the page's UI server control hierarchy.
trans-unit.target: Bruk OnBubbleEvent-metoden til å sende en hendelse utløst av en kontroll i beholderen sidens Brukergrensesnittet server kontrollen hierarkiet.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > This method is primarily used by control developers.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Denne metoden brukes hovedsakelig av kontrollutviklere.

trans-unit.source: The source of the event.
trans-unit.target: Kilden for hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.EventArgs> that contains event data.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.EventArgs>som inneholder Hendelsesdata.</xref:System.EventArgs>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to indicate that this method is passing an event raised by a control within the container up the page's UI server control hierarchy; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>for å angi at denne metoden er sending av en hendelse utløst av en kontroll i beholderen sidens Brukergrensesnittet server kontrollen hierarkiet; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.CancelCommand"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Hever den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.CancelCommand"> </xref> hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: This allows you to provide a custom handler for the event.
trans-unit.target: Dette lar deg angi et egendefinert behandlingsprogram for hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: Use the OnCancelCommand method to provide a custom handler for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.CancelCommand> event.
trans-unit.target: Bruk OnCancelCommand-metoden til å angi et egendefinert behandlingsprogram for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.CancelCommand>hendelsen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.CancelCommand>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.CancelCommand> event is raised when the Cancel button is clicked for an item in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> control.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.CancelCommand>denne hendelsen oppstår når du klikker Avbryt-knappen for et element i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.CancelCommand>

trans-unit.source: A typical handler for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.CancelCommand> event sets the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.EditItemIndex%2A> property to `-1` (to deselect the item) and then rebinds the data to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> control.
trans-unit.target: Et vanlig behandlingsprogram for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.CancelCommand>hendelsen angir den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.EditItemIndex%2A>egenskapen `-1` (for å oppheve elementet) og rebinds data til den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.EditItemIndex%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.CancelCommand>

trans-unit.source: > [!CAUTION] > Text is not HTML encoded before it is displayed in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> control.
trans-unit.target: > [!CAUTION] > Text er ikke HTML-kodede før den vises i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>

trans-unit.source: This makes it possible to embed script within HTML tags in the text.
trans-unit.target: Dette gjør det mulig å bygge inn skriptet i HTML-koder i teksten.

trans-unit.source: If the values for the control come from user input, be sure to validate the values to reduce security vulnerabilities.
trans-unit.target: Hvis verdiene for kontrollen kommer fra brukerinndata, må du validere verdiene for å redusere sikkerhetsproblemer.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.DeleteCommand> event is raised when the Delete button is clicked for an item in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> control.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.DeleteCommand>denne hendelsen oppstår når Slett klikkes for et element i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.DeleteCommand>

trans-unit.source: A typical handler for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.DeleteCommand> event removes the selected item from the data source and then rebinds the data to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> control.
trans-unit.target: Et vanlig behandlingsprogram for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.DeleteCommand>hendelsen fjerner det valgte elementet fra datakilden og rebinds data til den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.DeleteCommand>

trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.EditCommand>denne hendelsen oppstår når Rediger-knappen for et element i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.EditCommand>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.ItemCreated> event is raised when an item in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> control is created, both during round-trips and at the time data is bound to the control.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.ItemCreated>denne hendelsen oppstår når et element i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>kontrollen er opprettet, under gå veien om og da dataene er bundet til kontrollen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.ItemCreated>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.ItemCreated> event is commonly used to control the content and appearance of a row in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> control.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.ItemCreated>hendelsen brukes vanligvis til å kontrollere innholdet og utseendet til en rad i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.ItemCreated>

trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItemEventArgs"> </xref> som inneholder Hendelsesdata.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.ItemDataBound"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Hever den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.ItemDataBound"> </xref> hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: This allows you to provide a custom handler for the event.
trans-unit.target: Dette lar deg angi et egendefinert behandlingsprogram for hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: Use the OnItemDataBound method to provide a custom handler for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.ItemDataBound> event.
trans-unit.target: Bruk OnItemDataBound-metoden til å angi et egendefinert behandlingsprogram for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.ItemDataBound>hendelsen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.ItemDataBound>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.ItemDataBound> event is raised after an item is data bound to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> control.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.ItemDataBound>denne hendelsen oppstår når et element er databundet til den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.ItemDataBound>

trans-unit.source: This event provides you with the last opportunity to access the data item before it is displayed on the client.
trans-unit.target: Denne hendelsen gir deg siste muligheten til å få tilgang til dataelementet før den vises på klienten.

trans-unit.source: After this event is raised, the data item is nulled out and no longer available.
trans-unit.target: Når denne hendelsen oppstår, nulled dataelementet ut og ikke lenger tilgjengelig.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.PageIndexChanged"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Hever den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.PageIndexChanged"> </xref> hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: This allows you to provide a custom handler for the event.
trans-unit.target: Dette lar deg angi et egendefinert behandlingsprogram for hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: Use the OnPageIndexChanged method to provide a custom handler for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.PageIndexChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: Bruk OnPageIndexChanged-metoden til å angi et egendefinert behandlingsprogram for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.PageIndexChanged>hendelsen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.PageIndexChanged>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.PageIndexChanged> event is raised when one of the page selection elements is clicked.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.PageIndexChanged>denne hendelsen oppstår når ett av siden utvalget elementene klikkes.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.PageIndexChanged>

trans-unit.source: A typical handler for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.PageIndexChanged> event sets the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.CurrentPageIndex%2A> property to the index of the page you want to display and then uses the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataBind%2A> method to bind the data to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> control.
trans-unit.target: Et vanlig behandlingsprogram for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.PageIndexChanged>hendelsen angir den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.CurrentPageIndex%2A>egenskapen indeksen for siden du vil vise og deretter bruker de <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataBind%2A>metode til å binde data til den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataBind%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.CurrentPageIndex%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.PageIndexChanged>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The event handler receives a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridPageChangedEventArgs> object as a parameter.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Hendelsesbehandlingen mottar en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridPageChangedEventArgs>objektet som en parameter.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridPageChangedEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridPageChangedEventArgs.NewPageIndex%2A> property of this parameter to determine the index of the page selected by the user from the page selection elements of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> control.
trans-unit.target: Du kan bruke den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridPageChangedEventArgs.NewPageIndex%2A>for denne parameteren til å bestemme indeksen for siden som er valgt av brukeren fra siden utvalget elementer i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridPageChangedEventArgs.NewPageIndex%2A>

trans-unit.target: Bruk OnSortCommand-metoden til å angi et egendefinert behandlingsprogram for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.SortCommand>hendelsen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.SortCommand>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.SortCommand> event is raised when a column is sorted.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.SortCommand>denne hendelsen oppstår når en kolonne sorteres.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.SortCommand>

trans-unit.source: A typical handler for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.SortCommand> event sorts the list, and then rebinds the data to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> control.
trans-unit.target: Et vanlig behandlingsprogram for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.SortCommand>hendelsen sorterer listen og rebinds data til den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.SortCommand>

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.UpdateCommand"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Hever den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.UpdateCommand"> </xref> hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: This allows you to provide a custom handler for the event.
trans-unit.target: Dette lar deg angi et egendefinert behandlingsprogram for hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: Use the OnUpdateCommand method to provide a custom handler for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.UpdateCommand> event.
trans-unit.target: Bruk OnUpdateCommand-metoden til å angi et egendefinert behandlingsprogram for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.UpdateCommand>hendelsen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.UpdateCommand>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.UpdateCommand> event is raised when the Update button for an item is clicked.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.UpdateCommand>denne hendelsen oppstår når du klikker oppdateringsknappen for et element.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.UpdateCommand>

trans-unit.source: A typical handler for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.UpdateCommand> event updates the data, sets the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.EditItemIndex%2A> property to -1 (to deselect the item), and then rebinds the data to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> control.
trans-unit.target: Et vanlig behandlingsprogram for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.UpdateCommand>hendelsen oppdaterer dataene, angir den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.EditItemIndex%2A>egenskapen til -1 (for å oppheve elementet), og rebinds dataene som skal den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.EditItemIndex%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.UpdateCommand>

trans-unit.source: > [!CAUTION] > Text is not HTML encoded before it is displayed in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> control.
trans-unit.target: > [!CAUTION] > Text er ikke HTML-kodede før den vises i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>

trans-unit.source: If the values for the control come from user input, be sure to validate the values to reduce security vulnerabilities.
trans-unit.target: Hvis verdiene for kontrollen kommer fra brukerinndata, må du validere verdiene for å redusere sikkerhetsproblemer.

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [NIB: Raising an Event](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/f2adaf01-1ed1-42e1-8c31-8d467e7e0ee2).

trans-unit.source: The OnUpdateCommand method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: Metoden OnUpdateCommand kan også avledede klasser behandle hendelsen uten å knytte representant.

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: Dette er den foretrukne metoden for behandling av hendelsen i en avledet klasse.

trans-unit.source: Represents the Page command name.
trans-unit.target: Representerer navnet på side-kommandoen.

trans-unit.source: This field is read-only.
trans-unit.target: Dette feltet er skrivebeskyttet.

trans-unit.source: Use the PageCommandName field to represent the Page command name.
trans-unit.target: Bruk feltet PageCommandName for å representere kommandonavnet siden.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Gets the total number of pages required to display the items in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Henter det totale antallet sider som kreves for å vise elementer i den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: Use this property to programmatically determine the number of pages required to display the items in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> control.
trans-unit.target: Bruk denne egenskapen til å fastslå programmatisk antallet sider som kreves for å vise elementer i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>

trans-unit.source: This property is only used when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.AllowPaging%2A> property is set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen er bare brukes når det <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.AllowPaging%2A>er satt til `true`.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.AllowPaging%2A>

trans-unit.source: The total number of pages required to display the items in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Det totale antallet sider som kreves for å vise elementer i den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when one of the page selection elements is clicked.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når ett av siden utvalget elementene klikkes.

trans-unit.source: The PageIndexChanged event is raised when one of the page selection elements is clicked.
trans-unit.target: PageIndexChanged-hendelsen oppstår når ett av siden utvalget elementene klikkes.

trans-unit.source: A typical handler for the PageIndexChanged event sets the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.CurrentPageIndex%2A> property to the index of the page you want to display and then uses the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataBind%2A> method to bind the data to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> control.
trans-unit.target: Et vanlig behandlingsprogram for PageIndexChanged hendelsen angir den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.CurrentPageIndex%2A>egenskapen indeksen for siden du vil vise og deretter bruker de <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataBind%2A>metode til å binde data til den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataBind%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.CurrentPageIndex%2A>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Gets the style properties of the paging section of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Henter stilegenskaper for Bla-delen av den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: Use this property to provide a custom style for the paging section of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> control.
trans-unit.target: Bruk denne egenskapen til å angi en egendefinert stil for delen bla i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>

trans-unit.source: Common style attributes that can be adjusted include forecolor, backcolor, font, and content alignment within the cell.
trans-unit.target: Felles Stilattributter som kan justeres inkluderer forecolor, bakgrunnsfarge, skrift og justering av kolonneinnhold i cellen.

trans-unit.source: Providing a different style enhances the appearance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> control.
trans-unit.target: Gir en annen stil forbedrer utseendet til den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>

trans-unit.source: To specify a custom style for the paging section, place the `<PagerStyle>` tags between the opening and closing tags of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> control.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil angi en egendefinert stil for Bla-delen, kan du plassere den `<PagerStyle>` koder mellom innledende og avsluttende koder for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>

trans-unit.source: You can then list the style attributes within the opening `<PagerStyle>` tag.
trans-unit.target: Du kan deretter Vis stil attributtene i innledende `<PagerStyle>` koden.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridPagerStyle"></xref> object that contains the style properties of the paging section of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridPagerStyle"> </xref> objekt som inneholder stilegenskaper for Bla-delen av den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: The default value is an empty <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridPagerStyle"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Standardverdien er en tom <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridPagerStyle"> </xref> objektet.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the number of items to display on a single page of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir hvor mange elementer som skal vises på én side av den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: Use this property to specify the number of items to display on a single page of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> control.
trans-unit.target: Bruk denne egenskapen til å angi hvor mange elementer som skal vises på én side av den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.AllowPaging%2A> property must be set to `true` for this property have any effect.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.AllowPaging%2A>egenskapen må være satt til `true` for denne egenskapen har virkning.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.AllowPaging%2A>

trans-unit.source: The number of items to display on a single page of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Antall elementer som skal vises på én side av den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: The default value is 10.
trans-unit.target: Standardverdien er 10.

trans-unit.source: The specified page size less than 1.
trans-unit.target: Den angitte sidestørrelsen mindre enn 1.

trans-unit.source: Sets up the control hierarchy for this <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Angir du kontrollen hierarkiet for denne <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: The PrepareControlHierarchy method is a helper method called by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> control to set up the control hierarchy in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> control before the control is rendered.
trans-unit.target: Metoden PrepareControlHierarchy er en helper kalles av den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>kontrollen for å angi kontrollen hierarkiet i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>kontrollerer før kontrollen gjengis.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>

trans-unit.target: Representerer argumentet forrige kommando.

trans-unit.target: Bruk feltet PrevPageCommandArgument for å representere argumentet forrige kommando.

trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.target: Dette feltet er skrivebeskyttet.

trans-unit.target: Bruk feltet SelectCommandName for å representere Select kommandonavnet.

trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the index of the selected item in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir indeksen for det valgte elementet i den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: Use the SelectedIndex property to determine the index of the item selected by the user in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> control.
trans-unit.target: Bruk SelectedIndex-egenskapen til å fastslå indeksen for elementet som er valgt av brukeren i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>

trans-unit.source: You can also use this property to programmatically specify which item is selected in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> control.
trans-unit.target: Du kan også bruke denne egenskapen til å angi et program som element i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>

trans-unit.source: To deselect an item in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> control, set this property to -1.
trans-unit.target: Å fjerne et element i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>kontrollere, angi denne egenskapen til-1.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>

trans-unit.source: The index of the selected item in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Indeksen for det valgte elementet i den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: The specified index is less than -1.
trans-unit.target: Den angitte indeksen er mindre enn -1.

trans-unit.source: Gets a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItem"></xref> object that represents the selected item in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Henter en <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItem"> </xref> objektet som representerer det valgte elementet i den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: Use the SelectedItem property to get a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItem> object that represents the selected item in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> control.
trans-unit.target: Bruk SelectedItem-egenskapen for å få en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItem>objektet som representerer det valgte elementet i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItem>

trans-unit.source: This object can then be used to access the properties of the selected item.
trans-unit.target: Dette objektet kan deretter brukes til å få tilgang til egenskapene for det valgte elementet.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItem"></xref> object that represents the selected item in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItem"> </xref> objektet som representerer det valgte elementet i den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: Gets the style properties of the currently selected item in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Henter stilegenskaper for det valgte elementet i den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: Use the SelectedItemStyle property to provide a custom style for the selected item in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> control.
trans-unit.target: Bruk SelectedItemStyle-egenskapen for å angi en egendefinert stil for det valgte elementet i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>

trans-unit.source: Common style attributes that can be adjusted include forecolor, backcolor, font, and content alignment within the cell.
trans-unit.target: Felles Stilattributter som kan justeres inkluderer forecolor, bakgrunnsfarge, skrift og justering av kolonneinnhold i cellen.

trans-unit.source: Providing a different style enhances the appearance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> control.
trans-unit.target: Gir en annen stil forbedrer utseendet til den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>

trans-unit.source: Item style properties in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> control are inherited from one item style property to another through a hierarchy.
trans-unit.target: Element stilegenskaper i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>kontrollen er arvet fra ett element-stilegenskap til en annen via et hierarki.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>

trans-unit.source: Item style properties set lower in the hierarchy are inherited by item style properties higher in the hierarchy.
trans-unit.target: Elementet stilegenskaper angitt lavere i hierarkiet arves av elementet stilegenskaper høyere i hierarkiet.

trans-unit.source: For example, if you specify a red font for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.ItemStyle%2A> property, all other item style properties in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> control will also have a red font.
trans-unit.target: For eksempel hvis du angir en røde skrift for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.ItemStyle%2A>egenskapen, alle andre elementet stilegenskaper i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>kontrollen har også et rødt.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.ItemStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: This allows you to provide a common appearance for the control by setting a single item style property.
trans-unit.target: Dette gjør at du må oppgi et felles utseende for kontrollen ved å angi et enkelt element-stilegenskap.

trans-unit.source: You can override the inherited style settings for an item style property that is higher in the hierarchy by setting its style properties.
trans-unit.target: Du kan overstyre arvede stilinnstillingene for en element-stilegenskap som er høyere i hierarkiet ved å angi egenskapene stil.

trans-unit.source: For example, you can specify a blue font for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.AlternatingItemStyle%2A> property, overriding the red font specified in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.ItemStyle%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: For eksempel kan du angi en blå skrift for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.AlternatingItemStyle%2A>egenskapen overstyrer rødt som er angitt i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.ItemStyle%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.ItemStyle%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.AlternatingItemStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the hierarchy order from highest to lowest.
trans-unit.target: Tabellen nedenfor viser hierarkiet rekkefølge fra høyeste til laveste.

trans-unit.source: |Precedence|Style Property| |----------------|--------------------| |1|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.EditItemStyle%2A>| |2|SelectedItemStyle| |3|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.AlternatingItemStyle%2A>| |4|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.ItemStyle%2A>| |5|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.ControlStyle%2A>| To specify a custom style for the selected item, place the `<SelectedItemStyle>` tags between the opening and closing tags of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> control.
trans-unit.target: | Prioriteten | Style-egenskapen | |----------------|--------------------| |&1; | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.EditItemStyle%2A>| |&2; | SelectedItemStyle | |&3; | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.AlternatingItemStyle%2A>| |&4; | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.ItemStyle%2A>| |&5; | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.ControlStyle%2A>| Hvis du vil angi en egendefinert stil for det valgte elementet, kan du plassere den `<SelectedItemStyle>` koder mellom innledende og avsluttende koder for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.ControlStyle%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.ItemStyle%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.AlternatingItemStyle%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.EditItemStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can then list the style attributes within the opening `<SelectedItemStyle>` tag.
trans-unit.target: Du kan deretter Vis stil attributtene i innledende `<SelectedItemStyle>` koden.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle"></xref> object that contains the style properties of the currently selected item in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle"> </xref> objekt som inneholder egenskapene stilen for det valgte elementet i den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: The default value is an empty <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Standardverdien er en tom <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle"> </xref> objektet.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the footer is displayed in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som angir om bunnteksten vises i den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: Set this property to `true` to display the footer in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> control.
trans-unit.target: Sett denne egenskapen til `true` skal vises i bunnteksten i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>

trans-unit.source: The appearance of the footer is controlled by using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.FooterStyle%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Utseendet til bunnteksten kontrolleres ved hjelp av den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.FooterStyle%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.FooterStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to display the footer; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Vis bunntekst; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standardverdien er <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the header is displayed in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som angir om toppteksten vises i den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: Set this property to `true` to display the header in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>.
trans-unit.target: Sett denne egenskapen til `true` skal vises i overskriften i <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>

trans-unit.source: The appearance of the header is controlled by using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.HeaderStyle%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Utseendet til overskriften kontrolleres ved hjelp av den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.HeaderStyle%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.HeaderStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to display the header; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Vis tilfellet. Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standardverdien er <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a column is sorted.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når en kolonne er sortert.

trans-unit.source: The SortCommand event is raised when a column is sorted.
trans-unit.target: SortCommand denne hendelsen oppstår når en kolonne er sortert.

trans-unit.source: A typical handler for the SortCommand event sorts the list, and then rebinds the data to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> control.
trans-unit.target: Et vanlig behandlingsprogram for hendelsen SortCommand sorterer listen, og rebinds data til den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om behandling av hendelser [NIB: bruker hendelser](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Represents the Sort command name.
trans-unit.target: Representerer kommandonavnet sortering.

trans-unit.source: This field is read-only.
trans-unit.target: Dette feltet er skrivebeskyttet.

trans-unit.source: Use the SortCommandName field to represent the Sort command name.
trans-unit.target: Bruk feltet SortCommandName for å representere kommandonavnet sortering.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriterTag"></xref> value for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Henter den <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriterTag"> </xref> verdi den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: The TagKey property allows the output stream to write the appropriate HTML markup for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> control.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen TagKey tillater utdata dataflyten å skrive riktig HTML-koden for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>

trans-unit.source: Always returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_HtmlTextWriterTag.Table" name="HtmlTextWriterTag.Table" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer alltid <xref uid="langword_csharp_HtmlTextWriterTag.Table" name="HtmlTextWriterTag.Table" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Marks the starting point to begin tracking and saving changes to the control as part of the control view state.
trans-unit.target: Merker utgangspunkt for å begynne å spore og lagre endringene til kontrollen som en del av visningsstatusen kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the Update button is clicked for an item in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når du klikker oppdateringsknappen for et element i den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: The UpdateCommand event is raised when the Update button for an item is clicked.
trans-unit.target: UpdateCommand-hendelsen oppstår når du klikker oppdateringsknappen for et element.

trans-unit.source: A typical handler for the UpdateCommand event updates the data, sets the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.EditItemIndex%2A> property to `-1` (to deselect the item), and then rebinds the data to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> control.
trans-unit.target: Et vanlig behandlingsprogram for hendelsen UpdateCommand oppdaterer dataene, angir den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.EditItemIndex%2A>egenskapen `-1` (for å oppheve elementet), og rebinds data til den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.EditItemIndex%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!CAUTION] > Text is not HTML encoded before it is displayed in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> control.
trans-unit.target: > [!CAUTION] > Text er ikke HTML-kodede før den vises i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>

trans-unit.source: This makes it possible to embed script within HTML tags in the text.
trans-unit.target: Dette gjør det mulig å bygge inn skriptet i HTML-koder i teksten.

trans-unit.source: If the values for the control come from user input, be sure to validate the values to reduce security vulnerabilities.
trans-unit.target: Hvis verdiene for kontrollen kommer fra brukerinndata, må du validere verdiene for å redusere sikkerhetsproblemer.

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om behandling av hendelser [NIB: bruker hendelser](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.target: Representerer kommandonavnet oppdatering.

trans-unit.source: This field is read-only.
trans-unit.target: Dette feltet er skrivebeskyttet.

trans-unit.source: Use the UpdateCommandName field to represent the Update command name.
trans-unit.target: Bruk feltet UpdateCommandName for å representere kommandonavnet oppdatering.

trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the virtual number of items in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid"></xref> control when custom paging is used.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir virtuelle antall elementer i den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid"> </xref> kontrollere når egendefinert Bla brukes.

trans-unit.source: Use this property to specify the virtual number of items in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> control when custom paging is used.
trans-unit.target: Bruk denne egenskapen til å angi virtuelle antall elementer i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>kontrollere når egendefinert Bla brukes.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>

trans-unit.source: This property is only used when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.AllowCustomPaging%2A> property is set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen er bare brukes når det <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.AllowCustomPaging%2A>er satt til `true`.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.AllowCustomPaging%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.AllowCustomPaging%2A> property is set to `true`, the number of pages required to display every item in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> control is calculated based on the values of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.PageSize%2A> and VirtualItemCount properties.
trans-unit.target: Hvis den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.AllowCustomPaging%2A>er satt til `true`, antallet sider som kreves for å vise alle elementene i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>kontrollen beregnes basert på verdiene i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.PageSize%2A>og VirtualItemCount egenskaper.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.PageSize%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.AllowCustomPaging%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.AllowCustomPaging%2A> property is set to `false`, the number of pages displayed in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> control is calculated based on the values of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.PageSize%2A> property and the total number of items in the data source.
trans-unit.target: Hvis den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.AllowCustomPaging%2A>er satt til `false`, antallet sider som vises i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>kontrollen beregnes basert på verdiene i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.PageSize%2A>egenskapen og totalt antall elementer i datakilden.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.PageSize%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.AllowCustomPaging%2A>

trans-unit.source: The virtual number of items in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid"></xref> control when custom paging is used.
trans-unit.target: Virtuell antall elementer i den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid"> </xref> kontrollere når egendefinert Bla brukes.

trans-unit.source: The specified value is a negative number.
trans-unit.target: Den angitte verdien er et negativt tall.
